name: Super Duper Flying Genocide 2017
description:
Super Duper Flying Genocide 2017 is a funny game about UFO that wanna catсh all the people on the Earth. Do you wanna help it?

Features:
- Customise your own spaceship : buy different upgrades , weapons and skins
- Lots of people, cath them all!
- Rivals. Keep this in mind - you are not the only one who wants to have a fan hunt! Some enemies (witches , crazy scientists and even people) wanna commit genocide on Earth. And they will... If you don't do anything .
- Many bonuses and secrets
- Some memes (a little bit)

It's cheap! It's fun! It's Super Duper Flying Genocide 2017!
